welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Adelphi, a charming and historic city known for its beautiful parks and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Tipton AAF Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic flights and houses a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves primarily American Airlines and its regional partners, with a few international flights as well.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves primarily Delta Air Lines and its regional partners, as well as some other domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used by Southwest Airlines for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is used by several airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is used by several airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'BWI Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport is available for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport is exclusively used by United Airlines for their domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, but may experience slower speeds during peak hours.
